text.section: There is a Maryland Health Benefit Exchange Fund.
The purpose of the Fund is to provide funding for the operation and administration of the Exchange in carrying out the purposes of the Exchange under this title.
The Exchange shall administer the Fund.

section.section: The Fund is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The State Treasurer shall hold the Fund separately, and the Comptroller shall account for the Fund.

text.section: The Fund may be used only to provide funding for the operation and administration of the Exchange in carrying out the purposes authorized under this title.

section.section: The State Treasurer shall invest the money of the Fund in the same manner as other State money may be invested.
Any investment earnings of the Fund shall be credited to the Fund.
No part of the Fund may revert or be credited to the General Fund or any special fund of the State.

text.section: A debt or an obligation of the Fund is not a debt of the State or a pledge of credit of the State.
